Venue: Knowledge Development Centre\n202a Aba Road, Port Harcourt
GDG DevFest Port Harcourt is an annual developer community-run festival organised by developers in Port Harcourt.
Join us on Saturday 16th November as we feature sessions on Android, Google Cloud Platform, Google Assistant, Flutter, Machine Learning with Tensor-Flow, and Mobile web.
You can check our events schedule here and plan to attend the sessions that fit your profile or things you\'d like to learn about.
